trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cape May
There were no other sightings in Cape May on or around October 5th 2012
Summary: {dr}Saw the UFO off shore, pulled over and recorded it slowly hover by.
divs: sighting detailsi was in cape may nj for a evening with my wife. i had my sony nex-c3 camera with me to take night shots on the beach of the moon. as i drove towards beach ave which is on the beach i was saw 3 lights in a triangle. i then pulled over and recorded the object. i zoomed in and out and it moved slowly from over the shoreline to inland. i heard no sound and it seemed be large. it continued on beyond my sight. i have a hd video of it at [link moved to fi section\cms\tg]
